title: Yaar Solli Kadhal lyrics Pathinaaru Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Yuvan Shankar Raja
Song: Yaar Solli Kadhal
Lyrics : Snehan
Movie Name : Pathinaaru

Yaar Solli Kadhal varuvadhu
Yaar Solli Kadhal povadhu
Yaaruku adimai indha kadhal
Yen indha kalam nagarudhu
Yen indha kadhal thagarudhu
Yen indha marupatta thedal

Idhayangal..ilayum tharunam therindhal solvai
Imaimoodi...irundhaaley velicham varuma solvai
Boomi luluka kadhal iruka engu odi olikirai
Boomi thanda vazhiye illai vaa..
Kadhal ingae thavaru endral
Kadavul kooda thavaru-than
Kadhal indri kadavul illai va

Unnai ne yen vadhaikirai
Karanangal theriyamal
Kadhal thane meendum unnai
Meetu edukkum
Ennai ne yen verrukirai
En nilami puriyamal
Kadhal unnai mounamaga azhugavaikum

Thedhi pol kadhalai neeyum
kilithuvida mudiyaadhey
Agaayathia ullangaiyil
Maraithu vaika mudiyaadhey
Kadhaluku maattru, edhuvum illaye
Aadai pola kalati poda
Mudiyavillai unnai naan
Uyirai-pola ennakul ullai va
Ennai meeri unnai edhuvum
Seidhidadhu kadhal thaan
Kadhalai-than nambukinren nan

Idhayathil ne kadhalai pootvaika mudyadhey
Savi endhu karathil iruku purindhu kolvaaiva
Vai-vazhiyil ne ennai thaan vendam endru sonnalum
Unnai orunaal undhan maname kondru-vidume

Neyum nanum serndhe seidhom
kadhal ennum sirpathai
Sirpam vendam endre neeyum
Thodanginai uthdhathai
Idhu enna niyayam neeye soladi
Innum 100 thalaimuraigal idha mannil vazhume
Andrum indha kadhal irukum vaa
Uyirgal janitha nodiyil-irundhu
Kadhal indae vazhudhe
Kadhal indri uyirgal edhu va

Yaar Solli Kadhal varuvadhu
Yaar Solli Kadhal povadhu
Yaaruku adimai indha kadhal
Yen indha kalam nagarudhu
Yen indha kadhal thagarudhu
Yen indha marupatta thedal

Idhayangal..ilayum tharunam therindhal solvai
Imaimoodi...irundhaaley velicham varuma solvai
Boomi luluka kadhal iruka engu odi olikirai
Boomi thanda vazhiye illai vaa..
Kadhal ingae thavaru endral
Kadavul kooda thavaru-than
Kadhal indri kadavul illai va
